tweet: The words and actions of our leaders matter. It is why we must give a name to what occurred. It is why we must take action against discrimination and stop the politics of hate and division. Now is the time to be clear about our values and who we are as a nation.

Our assets extend beyond Buckley: 50,000+ Coloradans who are employed in the aerospace industry, including at some of the 500 companies in our area that have partnered with the industry to launch the next generation of GPS & the Insight Mars lander. Aurora is ready for take off!

There are few places in the world where national defense and space infrastructure come together like they do here in Aurora. The military units at Buckley Air Force Base -- air, space, and intelligence -- provide a unique set of critical mission capabilities for the new command.

Aurora is home to secure infrastructure and supportive communities, that‚Äôs why I sent a letter to the Secretary of the Air Force to reestablish US Space Command here at Buckley. On top of that, it would be a major boon to our local economy. pic.twitter.com/qkAR1Xiy1m
